title.rendered: Use humor to deal with Trump

content.rendered:
One of the effective — and under-used — strategies of nonviolent resistance to bullies is to use humor and satire.  Donald Trump’s exaggerated ego and his cruel and criminal behaviors have made him a perfect object for humor and satire.  Consider these:

 

In 2 ½ minutes, this rewrite of the decades-old song “The Lion Sleeps Tonight” nails Trump!  Click here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TkU1ob_lHCw

 

 

Here is a 4 ½ minute video of Trump and The Simpsons.  This really does need to be watched.  It is hilarious, true, and sometimes scary:  https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x7zfso2

 

 

A new card for Trump:  A new card for Trump

jetpack-related-posts.title: Let’s use HUMOR and SATIRE for political purposes!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: One smart way to deflate the egos of egocentric persons and entities is to RIDICULE them with humor and satire. In our current crisis -- actually our MULTIPLE CRISES -- we have many opportunities to disempower them through humor and satire. Watch this short video, which encourages this: https://trlib.kanopy.com/video/send-clowns-humor-weapon  …
